import React from "react"; import { API } from "../backend"; import CrossIcon from "../icons/cross-black.svg"; import moment from "moment"; const ProductDetail = ({product, setProductDetail}) => { console.log(product.pCategory); return (

{product.pName}

setProductDetail(null)}>

{product.pName}

{product.pDescription}

{product.pPrice}

{product.pStock}

{product.pCategory}

{moment(product.createdAt).format("DD-MMM-yyyy")}

{moment(product.updatedAt).format("DD-MMM-yyyy")}

{/* {error && errorMessage()} */}
); }; export default ProductDetail;
